conclusion: Calculate total distance traveled by bus to determine if puppy is safe.
Break down distance into reaction time and deceleration.
Reaction time is 0.5 seconds, bus travels at 20 m/s.
Distance during reaction time is 10 m.
Velocity-time graph shows deceleration starts at 0.5s and stops at 5.0s.
Initial velocity is 20 m/s, final velocity is 0 m/s.
Total distance traveled by bus is 55.03 m.
Total distance is greater than distance to puppy, so puppy is not safe.
